description.value:
The grandmaster unleashes a qi wave as bright as the sun. All creatures within a 50-foot radius of the grandmaster who can see must attempt a @Check[reflex|dc:38] save, including the grandmaster themself.

Critical Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Dazzled] for 1 round.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded] for 1 round.

Failure The creature is blinded for 1 day.

Critical Failure The creature is permanently blinded.
